raw_body: Former Manager of Grindlays Bank, Country Manager of Quantas Airways & Cox and Kings. Dearly beloved husband of Shani, loving father of Yohan, Tanya and Rajith, loving father-in-law of Keiko, Vinoth and Nushara, loving grandfather of Ashoka, Emeni, Mila, Amaya and Ellie, only son of late Mr. and Mrs. G.P.D. Bandara of Hettipola. Cortege leaving No. 182/4B, Sapumal Pedesa, Off Stanley Tillekeratne Mawatha, Nugegoda at 2.00 p.m. for cremation at O
